Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Allows medical assistants to administer vaccines
Summary: Allows medical assistants to administer vaccines while under appropriate supervision of a physician, nurse practitioner or physician assistant.
LawCode: Amd ยง6526, Ed L; add ยง2113, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the public health law, in relation to the administration of immunizations by medical assistants
